body1.p: Full price 7 and 10 EUR; discounted price 5 and 7 EUR.
Tickets available at Bilešu paradīze box offices, on www.bilesuparadize.lv and before the performances.
Discounted price available for students, pensioners, persons with disability, members of the Choreographers Association.
Festival card 120 EUR (performances, classes, workshops) Discounted price: dance students 85 EUR, members of the Choreographers Association 60 EUR
Festival card to all performances 60 EUR. Discounted price: students, pensioners, persons with disability 40 EUR, members of the Choreographers Association 30 EUR.

body2.p: Fee for 1 masterclass (1,5 h-2 h) 7 EUR; 5 EUR - discounted price
Fee for 1 workshop (3 h) 10 EUR; 7 EUR – discounted price
Festival card to all classes and workshops – 70 EUR. Discounted price: dance students 50 EUR, members of the Choreographers Association 35 EUR.
